page.title: 13THE LIFE OF AN 8 YEAR OLD
page.content: We have one pet,it is a cat called Miff but Grandma takes care of her because Sally and I are at work and so are Mummy and Daddy but when we get home we take care of her. We have 5 rooms in our house. It is very old it is 200 years old. It is made of stone. It has a garden with a lot of flowers and two swings.In the kitchen we have wooden chairs. In the sitting room there is a soft chair that spins round and a hard chair with a cushion on it and a soft settee. I go to Denton school. There are two classes infants and juniors. We write stories we do maths we do gym too. We do art,we draw things like birds, trees, animals and we paint as well. The junior class is the biggest class. The teachers are called Mrs Onions she is the junior teacher and Miss Wilkinson is the infant teacher.
